gobblin.data.management.retention.dataset

Class TrackingDataset

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.data.management.retention.dataset.DatasetBase<TimestampedDatasetVersion>
      • gobblin.data.management.retention.dataset.TrackingDataset
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CleanableDataset, gobblin.dataset.Dataset

    public class TrackingDataset
extends DatasetBase<TimestampedDatasetVersion>
    DatasetBase for tracking data. Uses a DateTimeDatasetVersionFinder and a TimeBasedRetentionPolicy.
